title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Mobile-Supported Self-Regulated Flipped English Learning Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level English grammar and vocabulary proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can self-direct English learning activities over five times weekly using mobile platforms.
Learners can demonstrate over 80% participation in real-time classes and contribute to academic English discussions based on flipped learning materials.
Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies to develop personalized weekly study plans and achieve over 90% implementation rates.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
